name: ImmunizationAllIcd11ValueSet
title: Immunization / All / ICD-11
description:
Contains ICD-11 MMS codes from the [`2023-01` release](
https://icd.who.int/icdapi/docs2/SupportedClassifications/) that are descendants of the Foundation element `164949870` ("Vaccines") according to the [ICD API](https://icd.who.int/icdapi). Generated on 2023-06-23.
